subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/EVP_says_I_heard_someone_Sam_Cohen-evp.wav 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : It is doubtful this will be heard my many (if any) it is from the same place I got the date 1927. The park the water trough is in had some joining property donated by Sam Cohen (a store owner across the street from water trough) After he passed away he left land for the little area. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/EVP_says_I_heard_someone_Sam_Cohen-evp.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
